title: Anyone else noticing strange crit chance behavior this patch?
body:
I'm getting crits 3 times in a row with only an {{item:3031}}.

And I keep dying to sudden crits lately, I've played the game for over 3 years now and I have not seen crit behave as strange as it is this patch; am I having weird luck spikes or is anybody else experiencing this ?

**I just got crit by someone with 0% crit chance**, I am in game right now; checked his runes and his build. I'm 100% positive I got crit while he has 0% crit chance, what the fuck?!!!

replies.body:
Are you sure you're not confusing the crit with the new combat text sizes? They are pretty large after all, and will appear as critical strikes most of the time with the only thing making the crits noticable are a tiny symbol.

Also, there are critical strike runes.

The difference between those is an exclamation mark following the damage; I've seen it, I also know when a hit did more damage than it should. 

I checked on his runes, he had nothing. Standard AD/armor and a mix of MR/MRplvl, I double checked and made sure there was no crit chance glyph among them.
its hackers i bet. every patch i see more of them. i think they are piggybacking the update code to get access to the server
